授業方法: This class is conducted on campus.  Students will work in pairs and small groups to explore and discuss a range of socio-political issues.  In addition to extended discussions, students will work in pairs and small groups to complete shorter, unit topic-related interactive tasks.

第1回: Course introduction; Beginning-of-semester activities  (all 14 sessions held face-to-face)
第7回: Mid-semester schedule adjustment: complete previously unfinished activities and/or participating in non-textbook communicative activities
第10回: Preview "Discussion Leadership Project" information document; search for project-related material (approximately 1 hour)
第11回: Discussion leadership project: teacher example & group discussion practice
第12回: Discussion leadership project: peer review and workshop
Make revisions to the worksheet and final preparations for the presentation and discussion (approximately 1 hour)
第13回: Discussion leadership project presentations and group discussions
Complete the self- and peer-evaluation, if necessary
